# Unshakeable Foundation
## Scripture
"Everyone then who hears these words of mine and does them will be like a wise man who built his house on the rock. And the rain fell, and the floods came, and the winds blew and beat on that house, but it did not fall, because it had been founded on the rock." â€“ Matthew 7:24-25

## Reflection
As men, we often face storms in our lives - storms of doubt, storms of fear, and storms of adversity. But when we build our lives on the rock of Christ, we can stand firm against these challenges. A rock-solid foundation is not built by trying to stand against the wind and rain, but by building our lives on the unshakeable truth of God's Word. When we prioritize our relationship with God, we can weather any storm that comes our way.

As men of God, let us not be like the foolish man who built his house on sand. Instead, let us be like the wise man who built his house on the rock, and let the storms of life only make us stronger in our faith.

## Daily Challenge
"Spend 10 minutes in prayer today, asking God to deepen your roots in Him, and to give you the strength to stand firm against the challenges of life."
